RFQForm.Technology: Click here to select the appropriate technology.
RFQForm.RFQNo: Click here to select the RFQ number.
RFQForm.PlantCode: Click here to select the corresponding plant code.
RFQForm.PartNo: Click here to select the part number from the list.
RFQForm.SOPDate: Enter the SOP date if available.
RFQForm.RMName: Click here to select the raw material name.
RFQForm.RMGrade: Click here to select the raw material grade.
RFQForm.RMSpecification: Click here to select the raw material specification.
RFQForm.AddPart: Include part details in the table as necessary.
RFQForm.VendorCode: Click here to select the vendor code.
RFQForm.PointofContact: Click here to choose who you want to contact.
RFQForm.AddVendor: Provide the necessary details of the vendor.
RFQForm.VisibilityCheckbox: Check the box to select visibility mode.
RFQForm.VisibilityMode: Click here to select the preferred visibility mode.
RFQForm.save: Click here to save the data. Note that the quotation will not be sent to the vendor.
RFQForm.cancel: Click here to return to the RFQ page.
RFQForm.send: Click here to send the quotation to the vendor.

rfqView.ViewRfq: Click on the checkbox to compare the RFQs.
rfqView.ViewRfq_reset: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
rfqView.ViewRfq_compare: Click on the checkbox of the part number to compare the RFQs.
rfqView.ViewRfq_back: Click here to return to the RFQ listing.
rfqView.ViewRfq_remarkHistory: Click here to view the remark history.
rfqView.ViewRfq_view: Click here to view the viewing history.
